Name: Federated Commonwealth Alliance
Details:
Formally founded on 20 August 3028, Federated Commonwealth Alliance is an alliance between Lyrian Commonwealth and Federated Suns, bound through marriage between its two reagents, Archon Melissa Steiner and First Prince Hanse Davion. Their son, Victor Steiner-Davion, will become the future ruler of the unified Federated Commonwealth when Hanse and Melissa step down and the alliance will become a unified nation.


.
